org.ehcache.core.spi.store

Interface Store.Configuration<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - key type
    V - value type
    Enclosing interface:
    Store<K,V>

    public static interface Store.Configuration<K,V>
    The basic configuration for a Store.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      CacheLoaderWriter<? super K,V> getCacheLoaderWriter()
      Cache Loader-Writer for the store

      The Classloader for this store.
      int getDispatcherConcurrency()
      The concurrency level of the dispatcher that processes events
      EvictionAdvisor<? super K,? super V> getEvictionAdvisor()
      The EvictionAdvisor indicates if mappings should be advised against eviction.
      ExpiryPolicy<? super K,? super V> getExpiry()
      The expiration policy instance for this store
      Serializer<K> getKeySerializer()
      The serializer for key instances

      The type of the keys that a Store will hold.

      The resource pools this store can make use of

      The serializer for value instances

      default boolean useLoaderInAtomics()

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyType

        java.lang.Class<K> getKeyType()
        The type of the keys that a Store will hold.
        Returns:
        the key type

      • getValueType

        java.lang.Class<V> getValueType()
        The type of the values that a Store will hold.
        Returns:
        the value type

      • getEvictionAdvisor

        EvictionAdvisor<? super K,? super V> getEvictionAdvisor()
        The EvictionAdvisor indicates if mappings should be advised against eviction.

        The Store will use best effort to prevent eviction of advised mappings.

        Returns:
        the eviction advisor

      • getClassLoader

        java.lang.ClassLoader getClassLoader()
        The Classloader for this store. This classloader will be used to deserialize cache entries when required

      • getExpiry

        ExpiryPolicy<? super K,? super V> getExpiry()
        The expiration policy instance for this store

      • getResourcePools

        ResourcePools getResourcePools()
        The resource pools this store can make use of

      • getKeySerializer

        Serializer<K> getKeySerializer()
        The serializer for key instances

      • getValueSerializer

        Serializer<V> getValueSerializer()
        The serializer for value instances

      • getDispatcherConcurrency

        int getDispatcherConcurrency()
        The concurrency level of the dispatcher that processes events

      • isOperationStatisticsEnabled

        default boolean isOperationStatisticsEnabled()
        If operation statistics (e.g. get/put count) should be enabled. It is a default method to keep the original behavior which was enabled all the time.

      • getCacheLoaderWriter

        CacheLoaderWriter<? super K,V> getCacheLoaderWriter()
        Cache Loader-Writer for the store

      • useLoaderInAtomics

        default boolean useLoaderInAtomics()
        Whether Store should use loader-writer in atomic ops or not
